function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential toxicity of graphene-based nano materials when used in antiviral applications","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of complete assessment of cytotoxicity for antiviral materials","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unpredictable bacterial and viral infections","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Need for treatments and approaches to combat specific viral proteins","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High mortality rate due to covid-19","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased susceptibility of vulnerable groups to health hazards","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccessibility of psychological interventions in some regions","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through close contact, respiratory droplets, fomites, and contaminated surfaces","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inhalation of the virus carried in airborne particles from cough or vocalization","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Droplet spray onto facial membranes from cough or vocalization","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in cruise ship rooms up to 17 days after vacated","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 remaining viable and infectious in aerosols for hours","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus inactivation time reduced dramatically with an increase in incubation temperature","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 stability enhanced by bovine serum albumin, increasing potential for fomite transmission in indoor environments","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential aerosol transmission of sars-cov-2 in specific medical procedures, increasing the risk of airborne infection","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Claimed risk of short-and medium-range person-to-person distance in aerosol transmission","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential risk of indoor airborne transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear role of airborne particles in virus transmission","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"}]}
